About Me

I'm Bazmi Uddin, a Full Stack Developer from Gwalior with over 3 years of hands-on experience in building and optimizing scalable web applications using Angular, PHP (CodeIgniter & AdonisJS), and MySQL.

Currently, I‚Äôm working at Ubitech Solutions Pvt. Ltd., where I lead a team of developers to design and implement HRMS and CRM platforms. My work focuses on automating attendance systems, dynamic leave policy management, and real-time employee engagement tools ‚Äî improving system efficiency and overall user experience.

I‚Äôm deeply passionate about building user-centric, high-performance applications that balance clean architecture with a modern UI. I take pride in writing reusable, scalable code while constantly learning and implementing new technologies.
